intro: We certainly hope you know these answers, which all begin with the letter I. Go ahead - impress us with your intellect!

questions.ask: What lodging place in Bethlehem turned away Joseph and his very expectant wife, Mary?
What metal, used to sharpen other like metal, does Proverbs compare to friends?
What kind of place was Patmos, where John received his Revelation of Jesus Crhist?
What major prophet had a son named Shear-Jashub?
What does the apostle Paul urge Christians to be "...of God"

intro: Long before Monopoly popularized the "Get Out of Jail Free" card, these Bible characters found themselves stuck in a jail cell without one! What do you know about their stories?

questions.ask: What handsome son of Jacob was imprisoned after a false report from Potiphar's wife?
What wandering preacher was imprisoned for challenging the adulterous marriage of King Herod?
What notorious prisoner gained his freedom from Pontius Pilate a Jesus was sentenced to crucifixion?
What "weeping prophet" was imprisoned in a dungeon on false charges of deserting to the enemy?
What two things were Paul and Silas doing at midnight while imprisoned in a Philippian jail?

intro: Don't let this category bug you... All you need to do is answer five questions involving insects in the Bible

questions.ask: What hardworking insect does the book of Proverbs tell lazy people to learn from?
What insects are mentioned by the writer of the book of James as destroyers of clothing?
What insect swarmed Egypt in the fourth plague on Pharaoh - but stayed out of the land of Goshen where God's people lived?
What tiny insect did Jesus say the hypocritical Pharisees strained out of their food, only to "swallow a camel"?
What stinging insect did God use to drive enemy peoples out of the Promised Land?

intro: We're not talking about the hymn writer, Watts; the scientist, Newton; or the science-fiction wiz, Asimov... The Isaac in this category is a biblical patriarch. How well do you know his story?

questions.ask: What "father of many nations" was first of all father to Isaac?
What did Isaac's elderly mother, Sarah, do when she was told she would give birth to Isaac?
What was the name of Isaac's older half-brother?
Where did God tell Isaac's father sacrifice the young man as a burnt offering?
What did the Philistines, envious of Isaac's wealth in flocks and herds, try to destroy?
